articles.author: Aya Elamroussi
articles.title: A powerful winter storm claims at least 11 lives across the US as temperatures plunge, winds howl and power lines fall - CNN
articles.description: Hundreds of thousands of Americans are waking up in the dark to unlit trees on Christmas Eve, after destructive winds and heavy snow from a winter storm tore down power lines and endangered drivers across the country, killing at least a dozen people in its pa…

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Teenager killed in shooting at Mall of America, Christmas shoppers locked down - 9News
articles.description: A teenager was killed during a shooting at the Mall of America that sent frightened customers at the nation's largest shopping centre racing into a lockdown just before the holiday weekend, police said.
articles.content: Property News: House prices in some school catchments explode by up to $367,000 - domain.com.au

articles.title: Shooting sends Mall of America into lockdown - WCCO - CBS Minnesota
articles.description: A shooting prompted the Mall of America to go on lockdown Friday night on a busy shopping night less than two days before Christmas.

articles.title: Police: Mall of America on lockdown after reported shooting - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: The Mall of America has been placed on lockdown after a reported shooting, police in Minnesota said Friday.
articles.content:
